com.ibm.micro.client.mqttv3

Uses of Class MqttTopic

Packages that use MqttTopic

Package Description
com.ibm.micro.client.mqttv3 Contains a programming interface for communicating with an MQTT server using the MQTT V3 protocol utilising the Eclipse MQTT client implementation.

Uses of MqttTopic in com.ibm.micro.client.mqttv3

Modifier and Type Method and Description
  1. MqttTopic
 MqttClient.getTopic(java.lang.String topic)
Gets a topic object which can be used to publish messages.
  1. MqttTopic
 MqttConnectOptions.getWillDestination()
Returns the topic to be used for last will and testament (LWT).
Modifier and Type Method and Description
  1. void
 MqttCallback.messageArrived(MqttTopic topic,MqttMessage message)
This method is called when a message arrives from the server.
  1. void
 MqttConnectOptions.setWill(MqttTopic topic,byte[] payload,int qos,boolean retained)
Sets the "Last Will and Testament" (LWT) for the connection.
